name: PUPPYOO
0:
”Alexa, turn on puppy”
”Alexa, turn off puppy”
”Alexa, set puppy to auto”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
“The skill content is in English”.The PUPPYOO Skill offers users a convenient way to control Puppy R60 Robot.
To connect your Puppy R60 Robot to the Alexa Skill, first use the puppyoo App to connect your Puppy R60 Robot devices to the internet. Then open the Alexa App to find the PUPPYOO Skill, enter the Skill and click the "ENABLE" button. The authentication page will pop up. Enter the username and password of the puppyoo App. On completion, click Discover on your device. Alternatively you can say "Discover" to Alexa. After discovering the device, you will find the your Puppy R60 Robot device name in Alexa App.

You can now control your Puppy R60 Robot (named puppy)by speaking the following phrases to Alexa:

“Alexa, turn on puppy.” 
“Alexa, turn off puppy.” 
“Alexa, set puppy to auto.” 

You can check with your local reseller how to integrate the Alexa in you Home Manager system.
